title: Update the automatic message for a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: A short-term access token authorized by the TikTok Business Account owner. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: auto_message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic message. To retrieve the automatic messages for a Business Account, use /business/message/auto_message/get/ .

parameters.name: auto_message_type
parameters.description: The type of automatic message. Enum values: WELCOME_MESSAGE : welcome message. A welcome message is a message that is automatically sent to a user when they start a direct message conversation with you. SUGGESTED_QUESTION : suggested question. A suggested question is a frequently asked question displayed at the beginning of a chat. When the user selects a suggested question, the user will automatically receive the corresponding preset answer. CHAT_PROMPT : chat prompt. A chat prompt is an interactive button displayed above the input box. When users tap a chat prompt, the system will automatically generate a corresponding question for users to start the conversation. Note : An automatic message that is pending review cannot be updated. To check the review status of an automatic message, use /business/message/auto_message/get/ and ensure the returned audit_status for the automatic message is not REVIEWING .

parameters.name: welcome_message Conditional
parameters.description: Required when auto_message_type is WELCOME_MESSAGE . Information about the welcome message.

parameters.name: content Conditional
parameters.description: Required when welcome_message is passed. The text of the welcome message. Example: Hi there, Please leave us a message and we will respond to you shortly. Thank you! .

parameters.name: suggested_question Conditional
parameters.description: Required when auto_message_type is SUGGESTED_QUESTION . Information about the suggested question. You can only update one suggested question per call. To update multiple suggested questions, call /business/message/auto_message/update/ multiple times.

parameters.name: question Conditional
parameters.description: Required when suggested_question is passed. A frequently asked question to help users start a conversation. Length limit: 80 characters.

parameters.name: answer Conditional
parameters.description: Required when suggested_question is passed. The preset answer that will be automatically sent when a user selects the question. Length limit: 200 characters.

parameters.name: chat_prompt Conditional
parameters.description: Required when auto_message_type is CHAT_PROMPT . Information about the chat prompt.

parameters.name: title Conditional
parameters.description: Required when chat_prompt is passed. The name of the prompt button that is displayed above the input box. Length limit: 18 characters. You can use text, system emojis, and both English and non-English languages. To ensure optimal display, keep the name concise and clear.

parameters.name: content Conditional
parameters.description: Required when chat_prompt is passed. The corresponding question for the prompt that the system automatically generates for users to start the conversation when users tap the chat prompt. Length limit: 150 characters. You can use text, system emojis, and both English and non-English languages.
